pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Additive Regression Trees with Stan-Sampled Parametric Extensions // Fits semiparametric linear and multilevel models with non-parametric additive Bayesian additive regression tree (BART; Chipman, George, and McCulloch (2010) doi:10.1214/09-AOAS285) components and Stan (Stan Development Team (2021) https://mc-stan.org/) sampled parametric ones. Multilevel models can be expressed using 'lme4' syntax (Bates, Maechler, Bolker, and Walker (2015) doi:10.18637/jss.v067.i01).
